name: Metabolik
description:
The cell is about to collapse! Help it by joining the components of the same color.

You'll receive a new component every time you settle one so be quick!  Your health points can't go below 80 or the cell will die!

CONTROLS:

  • ARROW keys to move the component. Extra move to settle it down.
  • SPACE: speed drop! in the same direction than the last normal move.

Built in a day for the minijam-92. You'll find bugs because I didn't have as much time as I wanted, sorry.

GAME OVER conditions:

  • Your health goes below 90
  • You cover the middle position with a block.
